projects.name: AuctionHouse
projects.description: Enables users to place bids in real-time using WebSockets and a seamless bidding experience. Integrated a secure Stripe payment gateway to facilitate transactions for successful bids Load Tested with JMeter to handle more than 100,000 users and their bids simultaneously. Stored product images in Amazon S3 for scalable and reliable image hosting.

projects.name: ShopSync
projects.description: Enables users to browse various product and options between takeaway or delivery at checkout. Integrated a payment gateway to payment method, ensuring safe and secure transactions for users. Implemented an efficient real-time order management system with order tracking and notifications. Utilized Material UI components for creating dashboards on sales and inventory management.

projects.name: MiniGPT
projects.description: Utilized OpenAI's powerful NLP capabilities respond to user inputs to provide accurate responses. Leveraging OpenAI, enabling the chatbot to provide more relevant and coherent responses over time. Tailored the responses on user preferences, historical interactions, personalized experience for users. Integrated the chatbot into various platforms and scale it to handle a large number of concurrent users.

experiences.description: Collaborated with team members to develop and test web applications using MERN stack. Gained hands-on experience in database management and optimization. Participated in project planning, implementation, and deployment phases.

full_output.name: Heman Vikash K
achievements_and_awards: LeetCode: Secured Contest Rating of 1354 and Solved 300+ problems
